post:
See: http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/8375/fliphost-community-inspired-offer-storage-ssd-and-more-limited-1tb-for-7

I was lucky enough to grab one before they ran out.  Monthly cost is $7, and it's paid until May 27th.  Also it's currently provisioned in Choopa, NJ, but I'm sure they can transfer you back to Dallas if you want.
